Articles.Content:
Capture and powered landing:(unpowered,using parachutes is always needing ignorable dv and skill)

  • Ignorable:gilly minmus bop pol
  • A bit:mun vall ike laythe(wings)
  • Intermediate:moho eeloo dres
  • A bit too much:kerbin(wings) tylo duna(wings)
  • WHAT ARE U THINKING ABT(wings and helicopter system):eve jool

Going to orbit:

  • Ignorable:same as above
  • Jet engines:laythe kerbin
  • A bit:mun vall ike moho eeloo dres
  • what????(wings and helicopters):duna eve jool

Hohman transfer from kerbol:

  • A bit:moho eve kerbin
  • what???:duna dres jool eeloo

Hohman transfer to moon:

  • A bit:mun laythe vall tylo gilly ike
  • A bit too much:minmus bop
  • what:pol

Double escape:(single escape equvalent to capture)

  • A bit:minmus bop pol ike gilly
  • A bit too much:mun vall
  • what???:tylo laythe

Aerobreaking:(counting on difficulty instead of dv)

  • Easy:duna laythe
  • Needs practice:kerbin jool
  • what:eve

Lithobreaking:(counting on damage probability)

  • Safe:gilly(safe even from escape speed!!!)minmus bop pol eve(low terminal speed)
  • Not so safe:moho mun ike laythe vall dres eeloo duna
  • BOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM:kerbin tylo
Since this is not actually informational, your thread has been moved from Tutorials to Fan Works.
